Good day!  
What video equipment do you use?

I vote for pull to open

i am so excited i cannot wait!!!
Push to open will get annoying after the first day. Cool concept but not as functional as a pull/handle.
Push-to-open is the perfect recipe to really dirty surfaces full of grease and stuff. Talking from personal experience. Go with pulls.
Lol the moment you said you had freed the corner and had to see what  would you do with it, I was "storage! Storage! Storage!" 😅 loved the idea of the hidden pantry.
"there were numerous leaks in the roof" read: bullet holes.
Push to open gets very annoying very quickly.
I love frigging around with Sketchup. It's SO easy to use and if you need a shape, pipe or any 3D model, someone has usually already figured it out and posted it in the warehouse.
Push to open is honestly really annoying. Do the subtle ones
I like the floating table idea. It would be really cool to do it in butcher block to match the butcher block on the other end of countertop
I’d go with the pulls. It’s the jewelry of the kitchen.
I dropping this comment to support you more✌🏻
